body.p:
If prompts you to enter the authentication certificate, although you already provided it in a previous session, then you should make sure that your local machine user account has the necessary rights to store certificate files in the Subversion configuration folder (write access to Subversion folder and all its subfolders). Usually, it is located in the following locations:
Windows: [HOME_DIR]\AppData\Roaming\Subversion
Mac OS X and Linux: [HOME_DIR]/.subversion
